thread.title: Groom Surprises Bride With Her Dream Puppy At Wedding
thread.title_full: Groom Surprises Bride With Her Dream Puppy At Wedding

author: Reshareworthy Editorial Team
title: Groom Surprises Bride With Her Dream Puppy At Wedding
text:
Groom Surprises Bride With Her Dream Puppy At Wedding Subscribe to Reshareworthy! It's FREE and always will be! 
Groom Jeff decided to surprise his bride, Jenna, with the wedding gift of her dreams. After their ceremony, Jeff is giving a speech to Jenna and tells her that they are now a “family of three”. 
She’s confused at first, and doesn’t know what he means, but then she looks to her side and notices a woman making her way over to her with a puppy. The puppy is a dream puppy – a British Labrador Retriever! 
Share this cute video with your friends and family. Subscribe to Reshareworthy! It's FREE and always will be! Like Us On Facebook!
